Description: Powerful digital marketing platform letting you connect to customers in a whole new way. This version only works with Legacy Packages.
Name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud (Legacy)

Methods.Name: Send Transactional Email
Methods.Description: Sends transactional email using Marketing Cloud's triggered send functionality. In order to use this service, configure a triggered send definition in Email Studio.

Methods.Name: Search Contacts
Methods.Description: Finds specified contacts based on provided attributes.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a new contact with the specified information in the specified attribute groups.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates a contact with the specified information in the specified attribute groups.

Methods.Name: Insert Data Extension Rows by Key
Methods.Description: Upserts a batch of data extensions rows by key.

Methods.Name: Fire the Event
Methods.Description: Fires the entry event that initiates the journey.

MetaTile: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Integration | Marketing Automation | Cyclr
MetaDescription: Connect your app with Salesforce Marketing Cloud to make your platform part of your users' marketing automation staples.
Content:
Integrate your application with Salesforce Marketing Cloud to be part of your users' marketing automation plans.

Create template automations using the Cyclr integration paltform and publish them to your very own integration store - your users can authenticate and activate them in a matter of clicks!
